# W3474-240199 3D Fused Filament - Material Extrusion Printing System

## Tender Details

* **Tender Title:** W3474-240199 3D Fused Filament - Material Extrusion Printing System
* **Reference Number:** WS4160901967-Doc4332306799
* **Publication Date:** November 30, 2023
* **Closing Date:** January 5, 2024, at 2:00PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 31, 2024

## Tender Status

The tender has expired. However, all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 5, 2024, at 2:00PM EST. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

## Business Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit a proposal for the acquisition of a 3D Fused Filament - Material Extrusion Printing System. The tender is open to all qualified bidders, with opportunities available in Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region).

## Technical Requirements

The required goods and services are classified under the following UN/SPSC codes:
* 23250000 - Metal forming machinery and accessories

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Tyler Vandonk, SPAC/PSPC
Email: [tyler.vandonk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tyler.vandonk@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Documents

To access the tender documents, please visit the following URL:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18155748?extsite=MTgxNTU3NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
